title: Welcome to Free Association
subtitle: A p2p platform for societal flourishing
your_recognition_description: Your recognition of contributions towards your own self-actualization
mutual_recognition_description: Your mutual-recognition with another is the minimum of your recognition of each other. This displays your mutual-recognition with each as a % of your total-mutual-recognition with all!
no_contributors: You have not yet recognized any contributors! Adding contributors to a node makes it a contribution!
no_mutual_contributors: You don't have any mutual contributors yet!
